name: GitTagExtractor
description: Extracts the Git tag for the current commit and saves it to $(ExtractedGitTag). If multiple tags exist, will return a semi-colon separated list, ordered alphabetically.
author: Matthew de Beer

OutputVariables.name: ExtractedGitTag
OutputVariables.description: Contains any extracted tags from the Git commit. Semi-colon separated, in the case of multiple tags.
